ComicInfo.Summary:
Thing and Hulk arm wrestle.
A host of demons plague the former Defenders and their friends thanks to a new book about magic. Namor gets trapped in Rick Jones' body. The Defenders re-form.
Rick makes up a song about Hulk's top ten villains.
Doc Samson has nightmares about the Hulk.
